changelog_body:
New: Upload Multiple Files + CSV Analysis

We've made some significant upgrades to how Floot handles files.

What's Changed:

Floot previously supported only a single image upload. Now you can attach up to 10 files at once, and we've expanded format support to include audio, PDFs, and CSVs.

With this, Floot can now also process CSV files. Upload your data and Floot helps you work with it directly through conversation:
- Create visualizations from your data
- Perform analysis without switching tools
- Import datasets to your database

Everything happens right in the chat - no need to jump between applications.

changelog_body:
üéâ Limited-Time Launch Offer ‚Äî 20% Off

We‚Äôre celebrating the release of Deep Research with 20% off NextDocs.

Use code: TAAFT
Apply it at checkout.
Limited time only.

‚∏ª

NextDocs v1.5.0 ‚Äî Deep Research

Released: February 2026

Great documents start with great research.

With Deep Research, NextDocs creates documents backed by real, current information‚Äînot guesses. AI researches first, then writes. You get accurate, sourced, executive-ready output.

Describe what you need.
AI researches.
You get informed results.

‚∏ª

Deep Research

NextDocs now researches your topic before creating your document.

Instead of relying on training data alone, AI actively gathers fresh information:
	‚Ä¢	Searches the web for relevant content
	‚Ä¢	Reads and extracts insights from articles
	‚Ä¢	Searches your uploaded files and knowledge base
	‚Ä¢	Combines information from multiple sources
	‚Ä¢	Cites sources directly in your document

This is research you can trust.

‚∏ª

Research Depths

Choose how deep you want AI to go.

Standard
Best for most documents. Focused searches. Key sources. Fast and reliable.

Deep
Built for whitepapers, investment memos, and detailed reports. More sources. Deeper analysis. Maximum coverage.

You control the depth. AI handles the work.

‚∏ª

Real-Time Progress

No black box.

Watch AI research live as it happens:
	‚Ä¢	See every search query
	‚Ä¢	Track articles being read
	‚Ä¢	Monitor progress in real time
	‚Ä¢	View sources as they‚Äôre gathered

Total transparency. Full confidence.

‚∏ª

Source Citations

Every researched document includes:
	‚Ä¢	A complete list of sources
	‚Ä¢	Direct links to original articles
	‚Ä¢	Clear attribution for facts and data
	‚Ä¢	A transparent research trail

Your documents are backed by real information‚Äînot AI imagination.

‚∏ª

Example Use Cases

Market Research Report
‚ÄúCreate a report on AI trends in 2026 with current market data and expert predictions‚Äù

Competitive Analysis
‚ÄúResearch and compare the top 5 project management tools ‚Äî features, pricing, and user reviews‚Äù

Industry Overview
‚ÄúWrite a comprehensive overview of the renewable energy sector with recent statistics‚Äù

Investment Memo
‚ÄúResearch Tesla‚Äôs 2025 financials and create an investment analysis document‚Äù

‚∏ª

How It Works
	1.	Enter your prompt
	2.	Choose research depth (Standard or Deep)
	3.	Click generate
	4.	Watch AI research in real time
	5.	Get a fully sourced document

Same simple workflow.
Much better results.

‚∏ª

Also in v1.5.0

Performance Boost
Faster editing. Smoother interactions across the editor.

Export Improvements
More reliable exports to Google Slides and PowerPoint.

‚∏ª

Try Deep Research

Go to nextdocs.io.
Start a new document.
Select your research depth.
Generate.

And don‚Äôt forget: use code TAAFT for 20% off.

‚∏ª

Research first.
Create second.
Better documents.

‚Äî The NextDocs Team

changelog_body:
Loamly 2.0 ‚Äì February Release
ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Gemini ‚Äì they're all recommending products and services now. But you have no idea if they mention your brand or send you visitors.

Loamly tells you:
- Which AI bots are crawling your site
See exactly when ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Gemini fetch your pages. How often, which pages, timestamps.

- What AI says about you
Track the actual prompts where your brand appears. "Best corporate catering Zurich" ‚Äì are you in that answer? Your competitor? Neither?

- AI traffic hitting your site
Someone lands on your pricing page from a ChatGPT conversation. Loamly catches that ‚Äì even when they copy-paste the URL instead of clicking (dark AI traffic that shows as "Direct" everywhere else).

- Where you're missing
Keywords your competitors rank for in AI that you don't. Gaps you can actually fix.

New this month:
‚Üí Intelligence page rebuilt ‚Äì real keyword opportunities, SERP vs AI correlation, competitor gaps
‚Üí All 4 AI platforms in crawls dashboard
‚Üí Tasks board with drag-and-drop Kanban
‚Üí GTM templates for one-click install
‚Üí Conversion tracking that links visitors to signups

2-minute install. 30-day free trial. No credit card.
https://loamly.ai

üöÄ New Release Highlights

‚úÖscalerX.ai Utility Token (SLXT) on Base

‚úÖSLXT is introduced as a protocol utility token supporting usage, staking, and internal incentive mechanics within scalerX.ai

‚úÖToken interactions are tied to measurable platform activity (automation runs, AI requests, and system usage), not external market behavior

‚úÖStaking with SLXT enables participation in protocol mechanics rather than ownership, profit rights, or revenue claims

‚úÖSLXT issuance and distribution follow predefined, usage-based rules and are transparently observable on-chain

‚úÖSLXT is designed to align long-term platform usage with protocol resource allocation and governance pathways

AI-powered assistant for B2B sales outreach
changelog_body:
Most outreach fails because you're talking to the wrong people. Jason AI SDR 3.5 solves this.

Jason helps you zero in on the leads most likely to buy. It automatically builds strategies that target small, specific audiences. Instead of sending countless emails into the void, you run smart, high-quality campaigns that drive real results.

‚Äì Identify high-fit leads:
You receive a score, a label, and a clear explanation for every lead. Filter them with a single click and engage only the prospects who fit this particular campaign.
No more guessing - early users see 2‚Äì3√ó higher reply rates by focusing on high-fit prospects.

‚Äì Use channels that convert:
Jason measures LinkedIn activity. Every prospect gets an engagement score based on their LinkedIn activity: posts, comments, and interactions.
No more messages disappearing into accounts which will never respond.

‚Äì Convert traffic into meetings:
Jason doesn‚Äôt just help you prioritize - it helps you capture opportunities automatically. Website visitors are identified and added to sequences in real time, so you start conversations while interest is high.

‚Äì Generate strategies in a click:
Now, Jason creates 15 completely different outreach approaches for your business in one click - all organized into ready-to-launch sequences.
Jason often suggests new audiences you may not have considered, giving you fresh angles to engage.

Better targeting. Higher replies. More meetings. All backed by data, not hunches.

Book a demo and see how Jason can serve your business.

short_desc: Multiplayer AI Canvas for teams
changelog_body:
illumi 1.0.0 : Building complex deliverables

üßò Focus Mode: 
Our power users love Illumi for visual learning and connecting ideas. But as your projects evolve from loose concepts into long-form documents - like that 40-page market expansion report - the visual noise of a whiteboard can become a distraction.

We built Focus Mode to give your ideas the space they deserve.

Why Fullscreen on a Whiteboard? When it's time to stop planning and start drafting, expand any card (Notes, Preprints, or Prompts) into a beautiful Fullscreen View. It‚Äôs a dedicated text editor living right on top of your visual workspace.


üß† Gemini 3: Now with Enhanced Web Search
We‚Äôve upgraded our integration with Gemini 3 to better harness the live internet. It‚Äôs no longer just processing data; it‚Äôs actively finding it.

Try this prompt: Ask it "What is the biggest news in February 2026?" to see how it pulls real-time, relevant context into your work.

‚ö° Speed & "Snappy" Navigation: We‚Äôve overhauled the navigation bar to handle heavy workflows.

Instant Loading: Even if you have hundreds of projects, your board list now loads instantly (prioritising your top 15 boards).

Seamless Switching: Jumping between whiteboards is now smoother and faster.

üé• See it in Action: From Solo Progress to Team Momentum
Wondering how this fits into your workflow? We‚Äôve put together a walkthrough of a common scenario: The 2-Day Consulting Sprint.

üß® Lunar New Year Offer: Last Chance!
We are preparing to launch our official pricing tiers soon. Sign up before the Lunar New Year to lock in early user benefits!

short_desc: Chat with AI models on an Infinite Canvas
changelog_body:
## MCP Support (Beta)

You can now add MCP servers and use them with LLMs that support tool calling. Note: Straico doesn't support tool calling.

## Fal AI Provider (Beta)

You can now add Fal AI Provider to generate images with Fal image models.

## Retry Button Has Moved to Messages

Regenerate / retry button has been removed in favor of regenerate message button that'll be visible as an icon underneath any LLM response inside Chat nodes.

## Updated Feedback and Bug Form

The feedback and bug form now automatically gets the license information and the main.log file. You can attach screenshots and screen recordings and just explain the bug or the feedback.

## Version and Update UI

Previously updates happened in the background and didn't offer any view into the download process. You can now click on the version label in the app and it'll open a popup to let you download updates if available. This popup will also display the progress of the download.

## Misc

- UI fixes
- Performance improvements
- Default Model settings have been moved to settings page. Set your default image, title, and chat models from settings > default models
- Fixed a bug where having custom providers still show "No AI running" popup in the canvas
- Reverted a change in auto save that was causing aggressive saves and making the app unresponsive in some cases

changelog_body:
AirMusic v1.1 introduces our core feature: the AI Music Generator, designed to help anyone create original music online in seconds.

With AirMusic, you no longer need music theory, instruments, or production experience. Simply describe the style, mood, genre, or use case, and our AI music generator creates a unique track from scratch. Every song is original, royalty-free, and ready to use.

This version is ideal for creators looking for:

AI-generated background music

Original songs for videos, games, or apps

Fast music creation without copyright risk

Use cases / Scenarios:
If you are creating YouTube videos, short-form social media content, mobile games, or marketing ads and need original background music fast, AirMusic lets you produce custom tracks without worrying about licensing, copyright strikes, or music production costs.

Key features:

Text-to-music AI generation

Multiple genres and moods

High-quality audio output

Commercial-use friendly
